Remove some principal components.

Source: R/EOF_methods.R
cut.eof.Rd

Returns an eof object with just the n principal components.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'eof'
cut(x, n, ...)

Arguments

x

an eof object

n

which eofs to keep

...

further arguments passed to or from other methods
